sen.j: 都 貞継（みやこ の さだつぐ、延暦10年（791年）－仁寿2年5月22日_(旧暦)（852年6月13日））は、平安時代前期の官人。
sen.e: MIYAKO no Sadatsugu (791-June 13, 852) was a government official (esp. one of low to medium rank) who lived in the early part of the Heian period.

sen.e: After he was assigned to an official of Ministry of Central Affairs in 824, he held positions such as the jo (provincial governor) of the Inaba Province, an official of Shikibu-sho (the Ministry of Ceremonial), the jo of the Bizen Province and Kazuenosuke.
